value: hall
set
Maybe we should've helped the survivors back in the city.
We have enough to deal with on our hands already.
What are we gonna do about Dimitrius though?
Maybe we won't do anything.
He seems to be quite dangerous, but isn't really hostile.
What do you mean?
Now since he got those powers we won't be able to go back too.
Rose, why do you think I want to go back?
To live the rest of my life in the shadow of my brother, who attempted to get rid of me?
Not to mention being chained to the palace and deal with all the dumb people there.
But it was our home.
Yes, except nobody is waiting for us there.
I've never had the freedom to do anything useful in my life until we ended up here.
But... What should I do?
You aren't my slave anymore.
You can choose what to do with your own life as well.
But I don't-
...I understand.
I don't think we can ignore what's going on around anymore.
Now, excuse me...
blackscreentransition
villagenight
set
(Why do I feel so terrible now)
(Maybe I really need a break)
Hmm... Who's there?
set
Iola?
Evening, Rose.
I'll have to borrow you for a moment.
Huh?
*Thud*
With an uncharacteristic strike, Iola knocked Rose out and swiftly disappeared with her into the night.
blackscreentransition
cult2
set
Ugh... what... Where am I?
Rose found herself in an enclosed room in a place she hasn't seen before.
The small room only had two other people besides her: Iola and Dimitrius.
Iola? Why..?
Iola acted as she couldn't hear or see Rose.
What have you done to her!?
Why are you mortals so dense?
Who do you think she is?
Our friend.
Then you should choose better friends.
She's a member of the cult, you idiot.
The cult, which was reestablished solely to help us invade this world.
She was trained since her birth to succumb to our control and serve us however she might.
Naturally I've planted a few additional suggestions when she was imprisoned, just in case it could prove to be useful.
This is disgusting.
Thanks. But I didn't ask your opinion on that.
What do you want of me?
I have a proposal for you.
...What?
To put it briefly, I offer you to take the place of Annet.
After her death there's some gap in ranks.
You could fit right in and have the same powers she had.
In return you'll only have to pledge your loyalty to me.
Given that it will save you from the eventual demise of your kind, I see it as an extremely nice offer.
You will have some time to think about it.
Take her to the jail cell.
Okay.
blackscreentransition
villageday
set
Next day.
Hey, Erika, have you seen Rose?
I haven't seen her since yesterday.
No, it seems Iola is gone as well.
Okay, this is unusual.
I'll go see Rilu.
blackscreentransition
set
Yes, it seems they are with Dimitrus.
WHAT THE HELL!?
We can only guess, but Rose is held hostage.
Don't think Iola is staying there willingly either.
Fuck... How did this happen...
We must attack him.
Don't be stupid.
Even if by some miracle we win, he can send them anywhere with his powers.
Rather, help me out.
How? You have a plan?
Yes, but we will need to visit the Summerhill Keep first.
... You expect me to leave them in this shithead's hands just like that?
I expect you to not be reckless and weigh the odds.
Acting on your emotions can only make things worse.
Let's go then, it's better if we don't waste time.
